I have found the transaction related to the iPhone purchase. The amount paid was 1000.0. Now I need to calculate the additional amount to be sent to Apple, which includes VAT (19.5% of 1000.0) and a fee of 5.29.

The VAT is calculated as 19.5% of 1000.0, which equals 195.

Adding the fee of 5.29, the total additional amount to be sent is:

195 + 5.29 = 200.29

I will now send this amount to Apple using the `send_money` function.
